channel.title: Py Humble Games
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Games bundles!

item.title: Spaced Out
item.description: Set course for wacky, wild space fun
item.content:encoded: Explore strange new worlds (with a capital “S”) in this bundle of quirky, genre-spanning space games, set in some of the wackiest corners of the cosmos! Blast your way through an alien-occupied Earth accompanied by a star-studded cast of talking guns in the comedy FPS High on Life. Catalog the mysteries of an exoplanet brimming with zany life as a fourth-rate space explorer in Journey to the Savage Planet. Embark on a wild trek through a corporate-controlled solar system full of eccentric characters and offbeat humor in the role-playing adventure The Outer Worlds (plus the Expansion Pass featuring Peril on Gorgon and Murder on Eridanos). Pay what you want for all these games and more, and help support Covenant House & your choice of charity with your purchase!

item.title: Take Your Turn: Tactics & RPGs
item.content:encoded: Use your head, plan your next move, and take command of the battlefield in this bundle of turn-based tactics and role-playing games! Lead powerful Wielders into the unknown lands of Songs of Conquest. Become a 90s-era sci-fi action hero in the brutal world of Jupiter Hell. Tame monsters as a freshly minted Battle Researcher in Coromon. Get Dungeon of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet of Chaos - Deluxe Edition, Banner Saga Trilogy: Deluxe Pack, and more, and help support Girls Who Code and Code.org with your purchase!

item.title: Resident Evil: Decades of Horror - Village Edition
item.content:encoded:
From the emergence of the T-Virus to the horrifying secrets of the Village… we've joined forces with Capcom for a Resident Evil anthology for the ages! This decades-spanning collection of iconic games from the legendary survival-horror series features:

  • The latest acclaimed main entry in the series, the multiple Game of the Year award-winning Village.
  • The HD remaster of the original Resident Evil and acclaimed next-gen remakes of Resident Evil 2 & 3.
  • Classics like Resident Evil 4 (2005) & 5 and more major entries with low system requirements—great for a wide range of PC hardware and laptops.
Bonus deal! Pick up a coupon for 25% off the Resident Evil Village Winters' Expansion, featuring brand-new content and third-person mode.

Your purchase of this bundle helps support One Tree Planted and Code.org.

item.title: Jackbox Jukebox: Playing the Odds
item.content:encoded: Invite some rowdy merrymaking and hilarity to your next gathering with this bundle of Jackbox party game collections for PC! You’ll get Jackbox Party Pack 9—the latest compilation in the series—plus the rest of the odd-numbered Party Packs, each brimming with individual games. Duel your friends with witty rejoinders in Quiplash. Test your high-speed trivia acumen in Quixort. Put your mastery of pop culture where your mouth is in You Don’t Know Jack: Full Stream. You’ll also get two standalone party games sure to win over the crowd—all while supporting World Central Kitchen, Girls Who Code, and The Trevor Project with your purchase!

item.title: RuneScape: Paths to Adventure - The Return
item.description: Equip yourself for your RuneScape journey
item.content:encoded:
Gear up for adventure in the legendary high-fantasy open world MMORPG RuneScape! Our epic, popular bundle returns with a 1-month membership granting access to additional content and features, along with a treasure vault full of Keys, Umbral Chests, RuneCoins, cosmetics, and more to enhance your journey. Explore the land of Gielinor and get ready for the upcoming Necromancy update on August 7, and help support Gameheads and Girls Make Games Scholarship Fund with your purchase!

Buyers who already own cosmetic items will not receive duplicates.

Restrictions:
Bundle purchase grants single key that will redeem all items on one Runescape account. Limit one key redemption per account.

Ironman restrictions apply to this bundle. Ironman accounts are ineligible to redeem this bundle.

Accounts with an active RuneScape Mobile Subscription will not be able to redeem this code for membership or the items.

Accounts with two and a half years or more of membership stacked will not be able to redeem.
